Features Section with Icons.Layout: Grid layout with multiple columns, presenting each feature in its own block.
Features Section with Icons.Design: Clean, organized, and visually appealing. Each feature block includes an icon, a headline, a brief description, and a 'More' link.

Key Elements.Section Title: Centered, bold headline with a supporting paragraph for introductory text.
Key Elements.Feature Blocks: Each block includes an icon, a title, a description, and a call-to-action link.
Key Elements.Icons: Visually distinct with a consistent style, enhancing feature recognition.
Key Elements.Grid System: Responsive grid layout, adapting from two to three columns based on screen size.

Features Section with Icons.Use Cases: Ideal for showcasing the advantages or main features of a product, service, or company on a landing page or about section.
